item.title: XML Schema Definition creation: Journal - Part 2: XSD file with <oXygen/> XML Editor
item.description: In part 2 of a new series, I cover how I created a new XML Schema Definition for journal-like XML files. This time we work with oXygen XML Editor to graphically create the XSD.
